attributes.action: Ensure that all the Bankers who have received bonuses in the last 5 years repay them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/CEObonuses/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
